# api.poet.PromptFuture { #openprotein.api.poet.PromptFuture }

`api.poet.PromptFuture(self, session, job, page_size=config.POET_PAGE_SIZE, msa_id=None)`

Represents a result of a prompt job.

## Attributes

| Name      | Type       | Description                                      |
|-----------|------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| session   | APISession | An instance of APISession for API interactions.  |
| job       | Job        | The PoET scoring job.                            |
| page_size | int        | The number of results to fetch in a single page. |

## Methods

get(verbose=False)
    Get the final results of the PoET scoring job.

## Returns

| Type                                              | Description                                    |
|---------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| typing.List\[openprotein.models.PoetScoreResult\] | The list of results from the PoET scoring job. |
